data.mPassive: Gains additional 5.85 XP per second (increases by 0.085 XP every age up from 1)
data.mGeneral: The Starfish has five arms coming off of its body. It has a feminine face in the center which resembles a smile. It is mostly a coral-pink color with a lighter-colored vertical stripe down each of its arms.
data.mTrivia:
Starfish does not give bonus exp to other pets.
Starfish gives approximal 3,600 exp every 10 minutes.
Starfish gains experience even when its hunger is 0.

data.mPassive: Pinch Pocket: Occasionally goes to another player and pinches them and grants you a small amount of sheckles
data.mGeneral:
The Crab resembles a stereotypical cartoonish crab, having oversized claws and two eyes sticking out above its head. It's a vibrant red color and keeps this color all around. It also has three pairs of legs as well as a smile on the front of its face.
Pinch Pocket: Occasionally goes to another player and pinches them, granting sheckles.
data.mTrivia:
Pinched players do not lose their sheckles.
Crab will still pinch the player from below if the player is high up. (on a plant, cosmetic, etc.)
Crab does not seem to have a run time limit.

data.mPassive: Scavenger: Shoveling plants have a percent chance to drop the equivalent seed. Does not work on fruits.
data.mGeneral:
The Seagull resembles that of a real bird having a pair of wings and feet as well as a long beak. It is mostly white with tuft of feathers on its head as well as a beak which fades from burnt orange to amber in color. It has two small feet that are a candy-pink. It also has two large black eyes on the front of its face.
Scavenger: Shoveling plants have a chance to drop the equivalent seed. Does not work on limited fruits like Candy Blossom.
data.mTrivia:
The Seagull flies slightly crooked
The Seagull is the first pet to modify the shovel.
The Seagulls trait closely resembles the gear, Reclaimer.
The Seagull was added in the same update as the gear, Reclaimer.

data.mPassive: Every 40s, eats a carrot at a 1.5x value bonus.
data.mGeneral: The Bunny is a Common Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Common Egg with a chance of 33.33%. The Bunny has 1,100 hunger.
data.mTrivia:
- Every 40 seconds, the Bunny searches for a carrot or chocolate carrot on the garden and eats it, automatically selling it at a marked up price of 1.5x value. The sell value multiplier increases as the Bunny ages.
- If no carrots are planted in the garden, Bunnies will wander around aimlessly.

data.mPassive: Every 60s, 5% chance to dig up a random seed.
data.mGeneral: The Dog is a Common Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Common Egg with a chance of 33.33%.
data.mTrivia: Every ~60 seconds, the Dog will attempt to dig up a random seed (only Seed Shop plants), with a ~5% chance to succeed.

data.mPassive: Every 60s, 5% chance to dig up a random seed.
data.mGeneral: The Golden Lab is a Common Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Common Egg with a chance of 33.33%. The Golden Lab has 1,000 hunger. Every few minutes, it naps for about 3 - 4 seconds (does nothing special while sleeping).
data.mTrivia: Every 60 seconds, the Golden Lab will attempt to dig up a random seed (only Seed Shop plants), with a 10% chance to succeed.

data.mPassive: Every 24:45m, flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation. (The time is reduced when the pet is leveled up.)
data.mGeneral:
The Bee is a common Pet added in the Bizzy Bee Event update.
The Bee can be obtained from the Bee Egg, which can be purchased for  18.
The Bee has 25,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: Every 24:45m, the Bee flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation. When pollination occurs, the following message appears: Bee applied Pollinated mutation to the [Plant].

data.mPassive: Every 40 seconds, the Black Bunny searches for a Carrot on the garden and eats it, automatically selling it at a marked up price of 1.5x value.
data.mGeneral: The Black Bunny is an Uncommon pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Uncommon Egg with a chance of 25%, and is a variant of the Bunny. The Black Bunny has 1,300 hunger.
data.mTrivia:
- Every 40 seconds, the Black Bunny searches for a Carrot or Chocolate Carrot on the garden and eats it, automatically selling it at a marked up price of 1.5x value. The sell value multiplier increases as the Bunny ages.
- If no Carrot is available, the Black Bunny will roam around the garden without taking action.

data.mPassive: Every 80 seconds, the Cat will nap for 10 seconds. New fruit within 10 studs will be 1.25x larger.
data.mGeneral: The Cat has a grey body, with dark grey whiskers and markings. The inner ears and nose are both pink, and the eyes and mouth are both black. It shares the same model with the Orange Tabby.
data.mTrivia: Every 80 seconds, the Cat naps for 10 seconds. Nearby plants within 10 studs will have their new fruit grow 1.25x larger.

data.mPassive: Increases egg hatch speed by 10%.
data.mGeneral: The Chicken is an Uncommon pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Uncommon Egg with a chance of 25%. Its maximum hunger is 3,400. When paired with a Rooster, it grants an 11.45% chance for the Chicken to lay an egg.
data.mTrivia: The Chicken passively increases egg hatch speed by approximately 10%. This boost can stack with other pets as well as Roosters ,kiwi or the Blood Kiwi.

data.mPassive: Gives a 3% chance for berry plants to stay when harvested.
data.mGeneral: The Deer is an Uncommon Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Uncommon Egg with a chance of 25%. The Deer has 2,500 hunger
data.mTrivia: The Deer has a passive trait which gives a 3% chance for berry plants which are (Blueberries, Strawberries, Raspberries, and Celestiberries) to replant themselves when harvested.

data.mPassive: Selling fruit has a chance to refund it to your inventory (2.5%). Rarer fruits have a lower refund chance.
data.mGeneral: The Monkey is a Rare pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Rare Egg with a chance of 8.33%.
data.mTrivia: The Monkey has a passive trait that gives a ~2.5% chance of refunding a fruit back to the player when selling it. Rarer fruits have a lower refund chance.

data.mPassive: Every 90 seconds, naps for 15 seconds and causes new fruit within 15 studs to grow 1.5x larger.
data.mGeneral: The Orange Tabby is a Rare pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Rare Egg with a chance of 33.33%. The Orange Tabby has 1,500 hunger.
data.mTrivia: Every 90 seconds, the Orange Tabby takes a 15 second nap. After the nap, any new fruit within 15 studs will grow 1.5x larger.

data.mPassive: Every 118 seconds, the pig emits a 15 second aura that grants a 2x chance for plants within 15 studs to grow variant fruits.
data.mGeneral: The Pig is an Uncommon pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Rare Egg with a chance of 16.67%.
data.mTrivia: The Pig has a passive trait which allows it to emit a 15 second aura every 118 seconds that grants a 2x chance for the nearest plant within 15 studs to grow mutated fruits. This trait can only affect fruits that have not fully grown.

data.mPassive: Increases egg hatch speed by ~20%.
data.mGeneral: The Rooster is a Rare pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Rare Egg with a chance of 16.67%.
data.mTrivia: The Rooster has a passive trait that increases egg hatch speed by ~20%.

data.mPassive: Gives a 5% chance for berry plants to stay when harvested.
data.mGeneral: The Spotted Deer is a Rare pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Rare Egg with a chance of 25%. The Spotted Deer has 2,500 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Spotted Deer has a passive trait which gives a 5% chance for berry plants to not disappear when harvested.

data.mPassive: Flamboyance: Occasionally stands on one legs and all nearby plants will grow incredibly fast
data.mGeneral:
The Flamingo resembles a stereotypical cartoonish flamingo. It has a long neck, legs, and beak. It is mostly a bubblegum pink, having its entire body that color as well as most of its beak and pair of wings. Its long, curved legs are more of a salmon pink color and its beak has a black tip on the end of it. Its face consists of two large eyes with a white sclera and black pupils.
Flamboyance: Every ~4 minutes, stands on one leg for ~15 seconds. All plants and fruits/crops within ~13 studs grows ~15x faster.
data.mTrivia:
Ability does not make fruits/crops grow larger.
Useful for fruits/crops that takes time to grow such as Moon Mango, Sunflower, and more.
Useless for growing plants because watering can is significantly better.
Moving plants using Trowel close to Flamingo works.

data.mPassive: Tropical Lover: Makes all nearby Tropical type plants have increased variant chance and grow bigger
data.mGeneral:
The appearance of the Toucan is similar to that of the Seagull's, being a bird. It is mostly black with an overall stubby appearance. It has small wings and feet, but a large beak. Its feet are cerulean, and its beak is a scarlet color on top that fades into a sunset orange. It also has two white circles around its light brown and black eyes.
Tropical Lover: Grants all tropical plants within 25.77 studs, a 1.70x size bonus!

Grants all tropical plants within 25.77 studs, a 1.18x variant chance bonus! (Rainbow and Gold)
data.mTrivia:
Works similarly like Praying Mantis, but it only works to tropical type plants, and Praying Mantis does not make fruits/crops grow bigger.
Tropical refers to Banana, Coconut, Dragon Fruit, Durian, Honeysuckle, Mango, Papaya, Parasol Flower, Passionfruit, Pineapple, and Pitcher Plant.
Moving plants closer to Toucan with Trowel does not work. The plant must be existing already.
"Increased Variant Chance" means higher chance of getting Growth Mutations (Gold or Rainbow). Does not affect chances of getting Environmental Mutations (Frozen, Wet, Chilled, etc.)

data.mPassive: Shell Share: Occasionally shares its wisdom to a random active pet granting bonus experience & Water Splash: Occasionally has a chance to Wet a nearby fruit
data.mGeneral:
The Sea Turtle has a simple shape. It is flat with four flippers, a large head and a dome-shaped shell. Its body is a grassy green, and its shell is a dark, foresty green. It has one black eye on either side of its face and doesn't appear to have a mouth.
Shell Share: Every ~10 minutes, shares its wisdom with a random pet, granting ~1000 bonus experience!

Water Splash: Every ~118 seconds, splashes water at a nearby fruit and it has a 10% chance to become Wet!
data.mTrivia: The splashed water does not make the growing plants and growing fruits/crops grow bigger nor faster. It can only affect fully grown Fruits/Crops nearby.

data.mPassive: Helping Hands: When crafting, each material has a chance for it not to be consumed
data.mGeneral: The Orangutan has a more complex build than many pets. It has a round face, two large arms, and two legs behind it. It also has noticeable hands and feet with them being smaller in diameter than its arms and legs. Its back is a subtle orange color, and the rest of its "fur" is a burnt orange color. Its face, ears, and paws are an ashy gray. Its face has two black eyes, two large ears, and a snout with two nostrils and a smile.
data.mTrivia: Helping Hands: When crafting, each material has a (3.49%) chance for it not to be consumed.

data.mPassive: Seal the Deal: When selling pets, has a 2.42% chance to get the pet back as its egg equivalent
data.mGeneral: The Seal has a fairly simple appearance. Its entire body is one color, being a slightly brownish gray. It has its head picked up by its neck, two flippers, on either side of it towards the front of its body, and a tail. On its face, it has a black eye on each side of its face and a snout that pops out the front that has a small brown nose.
data.mTrivia: Seal the Deal: When selling pets, has a 2.42% chance to get the pet back as its egg equivalent.

data.mPassive: Every ~20 minutes flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, giving it a pollinated mutation
data.mGeneral:
The Honey Bee is a rare Pet introduced in the Bizzy Bee Event update.
The Honey Bee can be obtained in the Bee Egg for  18.
The Honey Bee has 25,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: Every ~20m, flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation. This trait is exactly same with Bee, but with shorter cooldown.

data.mPassive:
Every 30m, the Wasp flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation.
Every 10m, the Wasp stings a random pet and advances its ability cooldown by 60s.
data.mGeneral:
The Wasp can be obtained from the Anti Bee Egg, which can be bought from the Limited Time Shop for  149 or crafted at the Bizzy Bear for:
25 Honey + 1x Bee Egg = 1x Anti Bee Egg
The Wasp has a yellow and brown body with 4 beige wings and 2 antennas. Its face looks angry like it wants to sting the player.
data.mTrivia:
Every 30 minutes, the Wasp flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation. When pollination occurs, the following message appears: Wasp applied Pollinated mutation to the [Plant].
Every 10 minutes, the Wasp stings a random pet and advances its ability cooldown by 60 seconds.

data.mPassive: Grants prickly fruit in a 30 studs radius a <1.50x size bonus!
data.mGeneral:
The Hedgehog has a stubby appearance. It has four small feet, two ears, and a chubby face. Its face has noticable cheeks and a snout with a nose that comes off the top. It has a neutral expression, having two black eyes and a neutral mouth. On its back, it has spikes resembling quills. Its body is a cream color, and its quills, nose, and inner ears are a softer brown.
Occasionally grants Cactus, Durian, Pineapple, Celestiberry, Nectar Thorn, Prickly Pear and Dragon Fruit a 1.51x size bonus. This trait is stackable, meaning that the more Hedgehogs a player has equipped on their farm, the bigger size will bonus they will get for their prickly fruits.
data.mTrivia:
Hedgehogs are primarily nocturnal, which make them more active at night.
The Hedgehog's trait is stackable.

data.mPassive: Every 60 seconds, decreases hatch time of egg with the highest remaining hatch time by 25 seconds.
data.mGeneral: The Kiwi is a bird with a brown body and head, that has a yellow beak and feet along with black eyes.
data.mTrivia:
he Kiwi's' passive is to go to the egg with the highest remaining hatch time and sing above it, making it decrease the egg's time by 25 seconds every minute.
However, the Kiwi will not do anything if there are no eggs on the player's plot or the eggs have no remaining time left, rendering it useless.

data.mPassive:
Every 25m, the Tarantula Hawk flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation.
Every 5m, the Tarantula Hawk stings a random pet and advances its ability cooldown by 80s.
data.mGeneral:
The Tarantula Hawk can be obtained from the Anti Bee Egg, which can be bought from the Limited Time Shop for 149 Roblux or crafted at the Bizzy Bear for:
1 Bee egg and 25 honey.
data.mTrivia:
Every 25 minutes, the Tarantula Hawk flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying the Pollinated mutation. When pollination occurs, the following message appears: Tarantula Hawk applied Pollinated mutation to the plant.

Every 5 minutes, the Tarantula Hawk stings a random pet and advances its ability cooldown by 80 seconds.

data.mPassive: All sprinklers last ~20% longer.
data.mGeneral: The Silver Monkey is a Legendary Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Legendary Egg with a chance of 42.55%. It has 8,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Silver Monkey gives an 8% chance to refund crops back to a player's inventory. Rarer crops have a lower chance of receiving these refunds. For example, a Carrot has a higher chance of being refunded than a Beanstalk. This chance stacks with other Silver Monkeys, as well as Monkeys.

data.mPassive: Every 24:46m flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying Pollinated mutation! 1.17% chance Flower type fruit stays after harvest!
data.mGeneral:
The Petal Bee is a Legendary Pet added in the Bizzy Bee Event update.
The Petal Bee can be obtained in the Bee Egg for which can be purchased for  18.
The Petal Bee has 25,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: Every 24:46m flies to a nearby fruit and pollinates it, applying Pollinated mutation! 1.17% chance Flower type fruit stays after harvest!

data.mPassive:
Silk song:
Every ~13 minutes, restores 100% hunger of a random pet by singing to it
data.mGeneral:
The Moth can be obtained from the Anti Bee Egg, which can be bought from the Limited Time Shop for  149 or crafted at the Bizzy Bear for:
25 + 1x Bee Egg = 1x Anti Bee Egg
data.mTrivia:
Every ~13 minutes, restores 100% hunger of a random pet by singing to it.
Having two active moths can totally restore the entire pets' hunger so they don't have to be fed anymore.

data.mPassive:
Moon Nap: Cat naps in a random spot in your farm, emitting an aura that boosts nearby fruit size.
Moon Harvest: Grants a 6.06% chance for Night type plants to replant when harvested.
data.mGeneral:
The Moon Cat has a lavender body, with neon lavender whiskers, mouth and markings. The inner ears and nose are both pink, and the eyes are black.
It shares the same model with the Cat and the Orange Tabby.
data.mTrivia: Every ≈70 seconds, naps for ≈20 seconds. New fruit within ≈20 studs will be ≈1.5x larger. ≈6% chance moon type fruits stays after harvest.

data.mPassive: Every >20 minutes, croaks and a random nearby Plant will advance growth by 24 hours.
data.mGeneral:
The Frog is a Legendary pet added in the Lunar Glow Event 2025. It can be obtained by hatching the Night Egg with a chance of 14%. There is a different variant of the Frog called the Echo Frog.
The Frog has a lime green and dark green body. The nose and the mouth are dark green, and the eyes are black. It shares the same model with the Echo Frog.
data.mTrivia: Every ~20 minutes, croaks and a random nearby plant will advance growth by 24 hours.

data.mObtaining_method:
Yes (Via Summer Harvest Event Rewards)
Night Egg 23.5%
Premium Night Egg 22%
data.mPassive: Every ~80 seconds, digs down underground to find treasure. Can dig up gear or sheckles.
data.mGeneral:
The Mole is a Legendary pet added in the Lunar Glow Event. It can be obtained by hatching the Night Egg with a chance of 22%.

The mole has a hunger of 50,000.
data.mTrivia:
Every <80 seconds, digs into the ground and finds Sheckles or Gears.
Moonlit status of either type on crops does not currently seem to boost much hunger, aside from celestial crops from Meteor Showers.
Here are the list of all items that the Mole could find:
1. 900-10,800 Coins
2. Watering Can
3. 1-3 Trowel(s)
4. Recall Wrench
5. Sprinklers:
  Basic Sprinkler
  Advanced Sprinkler
  Godly Sprinkler
  Master Sprinkler
6. Lightning Rod

data.mPassive: Verdant Bird: Every 12:00m, 16% chance to mutate a nearby fruit, applying the Verdant mutation.
data.mGeneral: Verdant Bird: Every ~9:00m, 16.00% chance to mutate a nearby fruit (chance can vary by age), applying the Verdant mutation.
data.mTrivia: When no nearby fruit exist, the Scarlet Macaw skips its ability and start cooldown again. Similar to other pets that gives mutations to nearby fruits like Dragonfly, Butterfly, Disco Bee, Chicken Zombie, Cooked Owl, and Hyacinth Macaw.

data.mPassive: Eggsperience: Grants pets hatched from eggs an age bonus
data.mGeneral: The appearance of the Ostrich is unique to most other pets. It has a long neck and slightly long legs. It also has two wings and a puffy tail in the back. Its body is black as well as most of its wings and tail, but its wings and tail are tipped white. Its face, neck, and feet are of a neutral beige color. Its face has two black eyes, a large, pale orange beak, and pink cheeks.
data.mTrivia: Eggsperience: Grants pets hatched from eggs an age bonus.

data.mPassive: Utter Beauty: Occasionally fans its feathers and all nearby pets will advance ability cooldowns
data.mGeneral: The Peacock is a very colorful pet. It is built very uniquely, and has a long neck, a crest on its head, a long beak, two wings, two legs, and a feathery tail. Its body and most of its crest is a royal blue, and its wings, tail, and crest tips are a vibrant green. Its beak is a sandy tan color as well as some specks on the top and bottom of each feather on its tail. Its legs are a sunny yellow as well as its eyes. It has a feminine pupil shape with the eyelashes on each eye.
data.mTrivia: Utter Beauty: Occasionally fans its feathers every ~10 minutes and all nearby pets will advance ability cooldowns by ~60 seconds.

data.mPassive: Chill Zone: All pets within 15.48 studs won`t lose hunger and will gain 3.48xp every second.
data.mGeneral:
The appearance of the Capybara is quite simple. It has a large head and snout as well as a chubby body. It has little feet as well as small ears on the top of its head. It's a cocoa-colored brown with darker brown ears, front of its snout, and bottom of its feet. Each of its feet have three small toes on it. The front of its snout also has a smile.
Chill Zone: Nearby pets' hunger will not go down and they will gain additional exp per second.
data.mTrivia:
Ability is always active. Once another pet gets close to the Capybara, they will immediately gain extra exp per second and they will not lose hunger.
If the other pet has zero hunger, it will not gain bonus exp from Capybara — similar to how Owls work.

data.mObtaining_method:
Oasis Egg
Premium Oasis Egg With 149 Roblux
data.mPassive: Has a 1.31% - 3% to duplicate an item or seed when purchasing from the gear or seed shop.
data.mGeneral: The Sand Snake closely resembles its real-life counterpart, except for the fact it is made of cuboids. It is a tan color, with a darker back. It has 2 fangs and a red tongue visible.
data.mTrivia: Buying from the seed/gear shop has a 1.45% to duplicate the bought item.

data.mObtaining_method:
Oasis Egg
Premium Oasis Egg With 149 Roblux
data.mPassive: Every 7:14m goes to another pet and does a lookout. That pet advanced cooldown by 21.06s! Has a 15.53% chance to do it again after each lookout.
data.mGeneral:
The meerkat has a small, upright body with a tan-colored face and chest. Its back, legs, and head are a darker brown, with a mane-like shape around the top of its head. It has short legs, a stubby tail, and a small black nose. Its eyes are square and shiny.
Every 7:14m goes to another pet and does a lookout. That pet advanced cooldown by 21.06s! Has a 15.53% chance to do it again after each lookout.
data.mTrivia:
Despite being less than 1 kilogram in real-life, the meerkat in-game weighs less or more than 1 kilogram.
Meerkats aren't really friendly towards humans but, they are kept as pets in-game.

data.mPassive: Gains 750 bonus experience every 8 minutes. Increases the player's jump height by 10%.
data.mGeneral: The Brown Mouse is a Mythical Pet added in the Blood Moon Event Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Mythical Egg with a chance of 26.79%. It has 15,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Brown Mouse's passive trait allows it to gain 750 bonus experience every 8 minutes and increase the player's jump height by 10%.

data.mPassive: Leafy plants grow 1.65x faster.
data.mGeneral: The Caterpillar is a Mythical Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Bug Egg with a chance of 25%.
data.mTrivia: The Caterpillar has a passive trait which makes all leafy plants grow 1.65x faster.

data.mPassive: ~10% chance for harvested crops to duplicate. +~5% chance to duplicate candy type plant. Rarer fruits duplicate less often.
data.mGeneral: The Caterpillar is a Mythical Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Bug Egg with a chance of 25%.
data.mTrivia:
The Giant Ant's first passive trait gives a 10% chance to duplicate a fruit being harvested. The more rare a fruit is, the less likely the fruit is to duplicate.
The Giant Ant's second passive trait gives an extra ~5% chance for candy crops to be duplicated when harvested.

data.mPassive: Gains 500 bonus experience every 10 minutes. Increases the player's movement speed by 10%.
data.mGeneral: The Grey Mouse is a Mythical pet added in the Blood Moon Event Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Mythical Egg with a chance of 35.71%. It has 15,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Grey Mouse's passive trait allows it to gain 500 bonus experience every 10 minutes and increase the player's movement speed by 10%.

data.mPassive: Every 80s, prays for 10.30s granting a 1.51x variant chance to crops within 10.30 studs.
data.mGeneral: The Praying Mantis is a Mythical Pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Bug Egg with a 4% chance and have 55,000 hunger bar.
data.mTrivia:
Every ~80 seconds, the Praying Mantis will pray for ~10 seconds, granting a ~1.5x chance to mutate crops within ~10 studs of the Praying Mantis. This trait applies to already existing plants.
It can give any type of mutation to crops within the 10 stud range except for developer or event special mutations.

data.mPassive: Attempts to steal a seed from another user's plot every ~10 minutes. But the chance to successfully steal a seed is rarer due to the seed the fox steal's rarity.
data.mGeneral: The Red Fox is a Mythical Pet added in the Blood Moon Update. It has a 1.79% chance of being hatched from a Mythical Egg.
data.mTrivia:
Every ~10 minutes the Red Fox goes to a random player's garden and attempts to steal a seed (only Seed Shop plants).
The Red Fox can NOT steal any event seeds, tested multiple times with only event plants in other peoples plots.
The Red Fox shares the same model with the Raccoon, but colored differently.

data.mPassive: 5% chance harvested crops duplicate! Rarer crops have lower chance to duplicate. 5% extra chance for Fruit type crops to duplicate!
data.mGeneral: The Red Giant Ant is a Mythical pet added in the Blood Moon Event Update. It can be obtained from hatching the Mythical Egg with a chance of 8.93%. It has 15,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Red Giant Ant's passive trait grants a 5% chance to duplicate crops when harvesting, with lower odds for rarer crops. Fruit-type crops have an extra 5% chance to duplicate.

data.mPassive: Extra 5% chance harvested plants drop seeds.
data.mGeneral: The Snail is a Mythical pet added in the Animal Update. It has a 40% chance of being hatched from a Bug Egg. The Snail has 12,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Snail provides an additional 5% chance (Lower chance for rarer plants) for a harvested plant to yield a seed. Its trait can stack with other Snails.

data.mPassive: Grants a 2.5% chance to keep a seed when planting.
data.mGeneral: The Squirrel is a Mythical Pet added in the Blood Moon Event Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Mythical Egg with a chance of 26.79%. It has 15,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: The Squirrel's trait grants a 2.5% chance to keep a seed when planting, with this chance decreasing for rarer crops.

data.mPassive: Every 25 minutes it turns a crop Honey Glazed
data.mGeneral:
The Bear Bee is a mythical Pet added in the Bizzy Bee Event update.
The Bear Bee can be obtained in the Bee Egg for 18 Honey.
The Bear Bee has 45,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia:
Every 25:00 minutes, it approaches a nearby fruit, causing it to mutate into Honey Glazed.
It is a reference to the Bee Swarm Simulator Bear Bee.

data.mPassive:
Rainbow flutter:
Every ~30m, flies to a nearby fruit with 5+ mutations, removes all mutations from it and turns it rainbow! Ignores favorited fruit.
data.mGeneral:
The Butterfly can be obtained from the Anti Bee Egg, which can be bought from the Limited Time Shop for  149 or crafted at the Bizzy Bear for:
5 Honey + 0.36kg Pollinated Strawberry: 1x Egg
13 Honey + 3.6kg Pollinated Nectarine: 1x Egg
28 Honey + 1.65kg HoneyGlazed Rose: 1x Egg
37 Honey + 15.8kg HoneyGlazed Beanstalk: 2x Egg
data.mTrivia:
Every ~30m, flies to a nearby fruit with 5+ mutations, removes all mutations from it and turns it rainbow! Ignores favorited fruit.
Gold is a variation not a mutation so it won't work if it has only 4 mutations and 1 variation.

data.mPassive: Every <5 minutes, croaks and causes a random nearby plant to advance growth by 24 hours.
data.mGeneral: The Echo Frog is a Mythical pet added in the Lunar Glow Event. It can be obtained by hatching the Night Egg with a chance of 10%. It is an alternative & better version of the Frog. It has 50,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia: Every ~5 minutes, croaks and causes a random nearby plant to advance growth by 24 hours.

data.mObtaining_method:
method
Crafted by adding a Anti Bee Egg, Sunflower, Purple Dahlia and 250 Honey
data.mPassive: Increases backpack size by ~25 and pollinates a plant every ~25 minutes
data.mGeneral: The Pack Bee is a Mythical pet, which can be purchased for 799 Roblux or crafted with Anti Bee Egg, Sunflower, Purple Dahlia and 250 Honey in the crafting station.
data.mTrivia:
The Pack Bee has an incredibly similar look to a Working Bee yet isn't multicolored.
Before the Mega Harvest update, the Pack Bee only had a passive ability to increase item storage.

data.mPassive: Mimicry: Every 20m mimics and copies an ability from another pet and performs its ability
data.mGeneral: The appearance of the Mimic Octopus resembles a purple octopus. It does not look like a real Mimic Octopus, but instead just purple with lavender accents. The Octopus also has yellow eyes with slanted pupils, it also has a small smile.
data.mTrivia:
If a Mimic Octopus copies a pet with two abilities like Queen Bee, it will only perform the first ability.
The copied pet's cooldown doesn't continue, instead it will restart. This is a huge nerf to its mimic ability.
Despite being an "Octo"pus, the Mimic octopus only has 6 tentacles.
Mimicry ability cooldown is reset upon joining a new server.
Mimicry is closely similar to Queen Bee's For The Queen Ability. The only difference is the one performing the ability.
Despite having 1% chance from the Paradise Egg, Mimic Octopus’s tier is mythical not divine unlike raccoon, queen bee, or dragonfly.

data.mObtaining_method:
Oasis Egg
149 Robux or 10 points at the Harvest Shop
data.mPassive: Every 8:00m, 15.63% chance to mutate a nearby fruit, applying the Cloudtouched mutation!
data.mGeneral: The Hyacinth Macaw resembles its real-life counterpart but it's much chunkier.
data.mTrivia: Every 8:00m, 15.63% chance to mutate a nearby fruit, applying the Cloudtouched mutation.

data.mPassive: 6.76% chance Summer type fruit stays after collecting!
data.mGeneral: The Appearance of the Axolotl is light blue, with 6 external gills surrounding it's head, tail, 4 legs. with blush right below the eyes.
data.mTrivia: 6.76% chance Summer type fruit stays after collecting!

data.mObtaining_method: Summer Shop - 15 Summer Coins or 449 Roblux
data.mPassive: Every ~3 minutes, runs in a hamser wheel and boosts crafting speed by 30.35% for 19s!
data.mGeneral: The Hamster appears quite similar to the Golden (Syrian) breed of hamsters. It is very square with cartoonishly large cheek pouches and pointy ears.
data.mTrivia: Hamster Wheel: Occasionally runs in a hamster wheel and grants increased crafting speed for a duration of about 3 minutes.

data.mPassive: Every 60s, decreases hatch time of egg with the highest remaining hatch time by 45s and increases its hatch speed by 20%.
data.mGeneral: The Blood Kiwi is a recolor of the Kiwi. It has maroon fur, orange feet and an orange beak, as well as red pupils.
data.mTrivia: The Blood Kiwi's passive is to sit above the egg with the highest remaining hatch time, making the egg's hatch time decrease by 45 seconds every minute. It also increases its hatch speed by 20%. If there are no eggs in a player's garden, it does nothing.

data.mPassive: Every ~5 minutes, one random crop will turn gold.
data.mGeneral: The Dragonfly is a Divine pet added in the Animal Update. It can be obtained by hatching the Bug Egg with a 1% chance.
data.mTrivia:
Once every ~5 minutes, the Dragonfly will turn a random crop Gold.
It is the first Divine pet to be released into the game, followed by the Night Owl, Raccoon and Blood Owl.
When being held by the player, the Dragonfly is not in their hand, and rather few studs away from hand and has their head at ground. This is most likely a visual bug as pet flies normally once placed.

data.mPassive: All active pets gain an additional <0.23 XP per second.
data.mGeneral:
The Night Owl dawns the appearance of its other counterpart, but with a darker purple. It is one of the 3 Owl mutations.
All active pets gain an additional >0.20 XP per second.
data.mTrivia:
Passive XP gain can be useful in attaining Pet or Egg Equip slots.
The Night Owl's ability is called "Movement Variation.

data.mPassive:
Every ~25 Minutes, a nearby fruit becomes magically pollinated, applying the Pollinated mutation.
Every ~30 Minutes, a random pet will refresh its cooldown.
data.mGeneral: The Queen Bee is a Divine pet added in the Bizzy Bee Event update. It can be obtained in the Bee Egg. It has 65,000 hunger.
data.mTrivia:
Every ~25 Minutes, a nearby fruit becomes magically pollinated, applying the Pollinated mutation.
Every ~30 Minutes, a random pet will refresh its cooldown.

data.mPassive: Every ~15 minutes, goes to another player's plot and steals (duplicate) a random crop and gives it to the player!
data.mGeneral:
The Raccoon has a slightly complex build. It has a large face with a snout, pentagonal ears, four small legs, and a small tail. Most of its body is a plain silver. It has a "mask" over its face that is a darker gray, similar in color to its ears and the stripes on its tail. Its inner ears, paws, and tail are a darker gray that gets fairly near black. It also has a white tuft on its chest, eyebrows, and snout. Its snout has a nose, but no visible mouth and appears expressionless.
Every 15 minutes, the Raccoon goes to another player's plot and duplicates their fruit, then gives it to the pet owner.
data.mTrivia:
The Raccoon has a somewhat similar trait as the Red Fox, guaranteed to reward the player a plant, including event exclusive plants, while the Red Fox duplicates seeds from only the Seed Shop.
The Raccoon, Red Fox, and the Fennec Fox are the only pets to directly interact with other players' gardens.
The Raccoon is currently the third rarest pet in the game.
The Raccoon is one of the highest in-demand pets in the game.

data.mPassive: Every 20m, 12% chance a nearby fruit becomes Disco!
data.mGeneral:
The Raccoon has a slightly complex build. It has a large face with a snout, pentagonal ears, four small legs, and a small tail. Most of its body is a plain silver. It has a "mask" over its face that is a darker gray, similar in color to its ears and the stripes on its tail. Its inner ears, paws, and tail are a darker gray that gets fairly near black. It also has a white tuft on its chest, eyebrows, and snout. Its snout has a nose, but no visible mouth and appears expressionless.
Every 15 minutes, the Raccoon goes to another player's plot and duplicates their fruit, then gives it to the pet owner.
data.mTrivia:
Once every 15 minutes, the Disco Bee will have a 12% chance to add Disco Mutations to a fruit.
It is the only pet that is able to give out the Disco Mutation currently, as it is not possible to get it through any other means outside of a Disco Event caused by an admin.

data.mObtaining_method:
Oasis Egg 10 Summer Coins
Premium Oasis Egg 149 Roblux
data.mPassive: Sly: Every 22:12m, goes to another player's random fruit, copies 1 mutation from it and applies it to a random fruit the pet owner owns! The higher mutation multiplier the rarer chance to copy.
data.mGeneral: The Fennec Fox's appearance resembles that of a real-life Fennec Fox.
data.mTrivia: Every 22:12m, the Fennec Fox goes to a random fruit in a player's garden, copies one mutation from it, then applies it to any fruit in the pet owner's garden. The higher a mutation's multiplier is, the rarer it will be for the pet to succeed in copying said mutation. Cannot put mutations on favorited plants.
